short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that imports page references into your Trello boards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trello Writers Block Extension is for anyone writing a paper, book, article, or publication that requires citations and you like to use Trello to keep track of your note cards.

When you activate Trello Writers Block Extension by clicking on the icon in the browser, it reviews the website and pulls out relevant information about the website to create an MLA or APA formatted citation. You are also able to tweak the details collected as needed, add your own notes and then select the board and list the card will be saved to.

NOTE: You will need a Trello account with at least one board and one list. To create a free Trello account go to (https://trello.com).

NOTE: Kryl Solutions is not affiliated with Trello or it's parent company Atlassian. By using this extensions, Kryl Solutions makes not warrantees (implied or express) for the services provided by Trello.

NOTE: This extension does not collect or access any of your information on behalf of Kryl Solutions, and nothing is sent to or kept on our servers. For further information on our Privacy Policy (https://kryl.com/privacy/privacy.txt) statement.

We are always looking for suggestions at Kryl Solutions, so please do not hesitate to contact us at info@kryl.com.

If you encounter any issues with this extension, please send email to support@kryl.com.
